item.title: New Module: PwnedPassCheck
item.description: Troy Hunt’s incredibly useful haveibeenpwned.com is a great way to check whether your email address and other personal information was exposed in a data breach. But it also allows you to check if a specific password was exposed in a breach as well. As of version 5, the list contains over half a billion compromised passwords and the number of times they’ve been seen in data breaches. My PwnedPassCheck module lets you query that data easily via PowerShell.
